What is the weather like in Salamanca?

If you're looking for summer vibes, the best time to travel to Salamanca is in July, June and August, when the average temperature reaches 24.39 °C, while August, July and June are the 3 sunniest months of the year, with an average of 165.75 hours. However, if you prefer colder temperatures, make sure you visit Salamanca during January, February or December to experience an average of -0.71 °C. For those who don't care too much about temperatures, but want to avoid getting wet in the rain, it's important to avoid travelling during January, February and March, when the average precipitation in Salamanca is 4.5 mm, while the months of January, February and March are drier, with an average of 0 mm.
